pr_title: Fix issue in recognizing overloaded instance method

timeline.message:
Fix issue in recognizing overloaded instance method

Failure is when there's an overloaded instance and static methods with parameters differing by one.
Resolve https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/22858

timeline.bodyText: do we have to check for static here?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: Yes, haven't tested BalEnv with instance methods yet. Will need a small change to make it work.
replies.author: manuranga

timeline.bodyText: Shall we include the message "more than one method found" or something related here?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: I thought the overloaded methods error code gives that idea.
replies.author: riyafa
